summary: This document is an email chain regarding a FOIA request from ABC News for five years of Jeffrey Epstein's banking records from 'Institution-1', as referenced in a July 12, 2019 letter to Judge Richard Berman in the SDNY case against Epstein. The email includes an attached exemption memo and a request for processing by July 14, 2020.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FOIA request for banking records from 'Institution-1' in the SDNY criminal case.

persons.name: Richard Berman
persons.context: The judge to whom a July 12, 2019 letter referencing Epstein's banking records was sent, as cited in the FOIA request.

events.title: SDNY Letter to Judge Berman
events.description: A letter filed in the SDNY case against Jeffrey Epstein (Case 1:19-er-00490-RA4) that references five years of Epstein's banking records from 'Institution-1'.

events.title: FOIA Request Submission
events.description: ABC News submits a FOIA request for Jeffrey Epstein's banking records from 'Institution-1', citing the July 12, 2019 court document.

keyFacts: A FOIA request was made by ABC News for five years of Jeffrey Epstein's banking records from an entity referred to as 'Institution-1'.
The request cites a specific court document (Case 1:19-er-00490-RA4, Document 11, filed 07/12/19) where these banking records were referenced in a letter to Judge Richard Berman.
The request was processed by the EOUSA (Executive Office for United States Attorneys) under tracking number EOUSA-2020-003382.
The correspondence indicates the request was entered directly into a portal and an exemption memo was attached for review.
